text: Hendrik Jacobus Marais (born ) is a South African rugby union player for the Russian club Enisei-STM in the European Rugby Challenge Cup. His regular position is centre. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1993 births Category:People from Lichtenburg Category:Rugby union centres Category:Leopards (rugby team) players Category:Pumas (rugby team) players
title: Henko Marais
